formatDescription: Lgs files contain all project information for Leica Geosystems HDS software. They enable storage and transfer between all Leica Geosystems’ HDS software products. Lgs files store information including: Name, Thumbnail, Coordinate system, Publish date, SiteMap image(s), Hyperlinks between SiteMaps, Timestamp, RGB colours and HDR colours. Files can be password protected.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: Leica Project File
internalSignatures.note:
